city.name: Macau
city.cathedral: The Ruins of St. Paul’s Cathedral
city.cathedralDescr: One of Macau’s most famous historical sites. The remains of the facade of an old Catholic cathedral, destroyed by fire in 1835, are a city symbol.
city.fortressDescr: An ancient fortress with magnificent views of Macau. Built in 1617, it served as a strategic defense point for the city.
city.casinosDescr: Macau is known for its casinos and entertainment complexes, such as The Venetian Macao, Wynn Macau, and MGM Macau. Try your luck at gambling and enjoy luxurious shows and restaurants.
city.cruiseDescr: A great way to see the city from a different perspective. Enjoy beautiful views of Macau’s coastline and landmarks.
city.villageDescr: A quaint village in Macau known for its colonial architecture and traditional shops. It’s a great place to experience the charm of old Macau.
city.museumDescr: A museum showcasing the history, culture, and art of Macau. It’s a good place to learn about the city’s past and present.
